function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction professionals expressing concerns about handling family issues during COVID-19","Impact":"Increased stress and distraction, potential impact on mental health and work performance","Mitigation":"Provide support and resources for managing family issues, offer mental health assistance and counseling","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, remote counseling services","People":"Construction professionals","Owner":"Employers, HR departments, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Differences in ratings of concerns about changes in project time/cost/scope between Group A and Group B","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of project risks and challenges, potential delays and cost overruns","Mitigation":"Facilitate cross-group communication and collaboration, conduct joint risk assessment workshops","Technologies":"Virtual communication and collaboration tools, project management software","People":"Construction professionals in Group A and Group B","Owner":"Project managers, team leaders, and facilitators"},{"Description":"Long-term impact of COVID-19 on construction projects","Impact":"Extended project timelines, increased costs, and potential changes in project scope","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans, conduct risk assessments, and explore alternative project strategies","Technologies":"Project management software, risk management tools, simulation and modeling software","People":"Construction professionals","Owner":"Project managers, risk management specialists"}]}
